name: CigarKings GmbH - Maduro - Toro
additionalNotes: CigarKings has its roots in the creative pursuits of its founder, Philipp Kugler, who conceptualized a cigar label during his studies at the age of 17, despite having no prior exposure to the cigar industry. What began as a project eventually evolved into his thesis and later materialized into a business idea. In 2016, Philipp Kugler founded CigarKings GmbH, marking the official establishment of the brand in the world of cigars.
